title: 2.2 In Babylon II: Ezekiel and Job
itunes:title: In Babylon II: Ezekiel and Job
description: In the book of Ezekiel God transforms from furious father to jealous husband. The prophet is commanded to protest against the Judeans with performance art. He has a few passages no-one can make head nor tail of. I also reluctantly tackle the book of Job, that most difficult of books.
content:encoded: In the book of Ezekiel God transforms from furious father to jealous husband. The prophet is commanded to protest against the Judeans with performance art. He has a few passages no-one can make head nor tail of. I also reluctantly tackle the book of Job, that most difficult of books.
itunes:subtitle: Ezekiel and Job, prophets of the Exile
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
